data.title: Hacka Doll
data.synopsis:
In the year 2xxx, development of information are going so fast, humans being are drowning in the sea information. This leads to a situation where people can not find the necessary information. The only hope to solve this problem is the navigator program, Hacka Doll.

(Source: Anime Bibly)

data.title: Backkom Meogeujan Yeohaeng
data.synopsis: A cowardly boy ends up having a magic necklace delivered to him which transports him to the world of Backkom. There the rag-tag team get out of jams and the boy learns a bit of courage by the time he arrives home.

data.title: Backkom 2
data.synopsis: The continuation of the previous season with more of a focus on the female penguin Backkom fancies (even though she has a boyfriend).

titles.title: Berni: El Divertido Mundo de los Deportes

data.title: Backkom Sports
data.synopsis: The 3rd season of Backkom which focuses on him participating and failing at a wide variety of sports.

data.title: Clock
data.synopsis: A bizarre short about a man who wakes up by a bunch of clocks only to act as a cuckoo clock for a room full of chickens at a bar.

data.title: Angel (Special)
data.synopsis: A man in a prison dreams of being an angel.
data.background: Angel was nominated in the categories of short film and animation in various international festivals and was awarded the 1st prize at the Japan Digital Contents Grand Prix 2001.

data.title: I Love Picnic
data.synopsis: The original short that kicked off the Backkom franchise.

data.title: I Love Sky
data.synopsis: The original short that the first episode of the Backkom the TV series uses its material from. The short is composed of two parts, Backkom skydiving into cow poop and Backkom skydiving into cactuses.

data.title: Contact 2
data.synopsis: A Backkom short about him meeting an alien that aired between the 1st and 2nd season.

data.title: Sheep in the Island
data.synopsis: A boat sinks leaving a sheep and a duck-dinosaur-fish hybrid stranded on an island.

data.title: Ultra Dino Makera
data.synopsis: The Makera demo reel for RG Studios. It features a dinosaur in a yellow jumpsuit rescuing a girl tied to train tracks.

titles.title: Private eye dol [プライベート・アイ・ドル]

data.title: Private Eye Dol
data.title_japanese: Private eye dol [プライベート・アイ・ドル]
data.synopsis:
Concurrent with an ADV game by HuneX/NEC-HE, the title is a pun about its detective and idol protagonist. It was released on issues 1 to 3 of NEC's Anime Freak FX, a CD-ROM magazine resembling a game for the PC-FX platform.

The hacker Idol King is targeting idols, exposing awkward scenes of their private lives. Now, the next is the popular May Star...

(Source: AniDB)

data.title: Contact
data.synopsis: A Backkom short about him meeting an alien.

titles.title: Tensai Bakavon: Yomigaeru Flanders no Inu
天才バカヴォン ～蘇るフランダースの犬～

data.title: Tensai Bakavon: Yomigaeru Flanders no Inu
data.title_japanese: 天才バカヴォン ～蘇るフランダースの犬～

titles.title: 美少女Mobage モバミちゃん

data.title: Bishoujo Mobage: Mobami-chan
data.title_japanese: 美少女Mobage モバミちゃん
data.synopsis:
DeNA promotional anime video for its line of mobile game. The mascot character for the line of games is called Mobami (a combination of "mobile" and "beauty.")

(Source: ANN)

titles.title: Minna Atsumare! Falcom Gakuen Second Season
みんな集まれ！ファルコム学園ＳＣ

data.title: Minna Atsumare! Falcom Gakuen SC
data.title_japanese: みんな集まれ！ファルコム学園ＳＣ
title_synonyms: Minna Atsumare! Falcom Gakuen Second Season
data.synopsis:
The warriors who have been warped by the rampaging power of Justice have been summoned into the world of Xanadu. It is up to Dark Fact, a former villain, and principal Lappi to re-educate these students.

(Source: AniDB)

data.title: SheepWolf
data.synopsis: A wolf makes a fool of himself trying to eat sheep that are playing baseball.

data.title: His Lipstick
data.synopsis: A young girl starting to put on make-up inadvertently ignores her pet rabbit who becomes a bit jealous.

data.title: Super Backkom
data.synopsis: Backkom comes back as a superhero trying to thwart a jewel thief.

data.title: Backkom Mission Impossible
data.synopsis: A pastiche to Mission Impossible featuring Super Backkom trying to turn on a television which showed the Backkom Song!! (as listed in the Backkom Specials entry).

data.title: Backkom: Jung-gug Gijeogwi
data.synopsis: A Backkom commercial featuring him trying to take a photograph in front of a Manneken Pis but keeps getting wet. So he puts a BaKen brand Chinese diaper on the statue when then prevents the statue from leaking onto him thus allowing a him to take the photograph.

data.title: Backkom Specials
data.synopsis:
ONAs posted on the official site of RG Studios' page and the director's youtube page that feature Backkom shorts that never made it to the main series nor the the DVD release of the main series.

This entry is composed of:
Backkom Feature Trailer - Backkom falling through the roof of CGV; the largest cinema chain in Korea, then taking a seat in the first row of the theater. (2007, 39 sec)
Backkom Filler Animation - Backkom at a library. (2008, 53 sec)
Backkom Song!! - Backkom jumping on a trampoline to a song. (2009, 30 sec)
Backkom's Friends - Backkom causing a chain reaction toppling various characters in the Backkom franchise and in Sheep in the Island. (2009, 40 sec)
Super Backkom - Backkom changing into his Super Backkom form in a portable restroom. (2009, 34 sec)
Tightly -  Once again Backkom needss to change into Super Backkom with the portable restroom. This time someone else is using it. (2009, 43 sec)
Super Backkom Technology Test Video - Super Backkom fighting a water monster and rescuing a girl who closely resembles the rescued girl in the Makera Demo. (2012, 63 sec)
Backkom Separate Garbage Animation - Backkom trying to separate his garbage. (2013, 90 sec)

data.title: Rokujouma no Shinryakusha!? PV
data.synopsis: A 6-minute promotion video of the novel.

titles.title: 這いよれ！ニャル子さんF

data.title: Haiyore! Nyaruko-san F

data.synopsis:
A new OVA of the light novel Haiyore! Nyaruko-san, titled Haiyore! Nyaruko-san F, has been green-lit.

(Source: MAL News)
